DOC.brief_summary: This study two part . Each participant receive daily injection LY2605541 one treatment period daily injection insulin glargine one treatment period . Each treatment period 2 3 week follow procedure lower blood sugar level see body recovers treatment .
DOC.brief_title: A Study LY2605541 Glargine Participants With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetic 1 year glycated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) less 9 % Otherwise fit healthy Non smoker Taking medication supplement insulin control diabetes Suffered hypoglycemic event last 12 month require hospitalization poor awareness hypoglycemia
